name: Student Activities
description:
Whatever it is that you love, Student Activities is here to help you practice your passion through involvement in one of our 1000+ student organizations.  

For help finding an organization that fuels your passion, check out the “Get Involved” tools on our website at http://studentactivities.tamu.edu.  

You can fuel your passion by:

Joining an organization

  • Use the “Get Involved” tools on the Student Activities homepage to personalize your search for the right organization.
  • If you are a freshman or a new student, check out Fish Camp at http://fishcamp.tamu.edu or Aggie Transition Camps at http://atc.tamu.edu. These camps will help you learn how to navigate college life, make lifelong connections, introduce you to Texas A&M traditions, and show you ways to get involved.
  • Check out our Center for Fraternity and Sorority Life in 226 Koldus. We have almost 60 nationally recognized chapters for you to get plugged into.
  • If you are passionate about representing the student voice on campus, visit Student Government Association at 126 Koldus or http://sga.tamu.edu. You can also visit Class Councils at http://classcouncils.tamu.edu if you are passionate about serving as a class officer, hosting class events, and preserving Aggie traditions.
  • Nothing fits your passion? You can create your own organization here at Texas A&M. Our Student Organization Development and Administration team will gladly help you make it happen!

Learning to be a Leader

Our Leadership and Service Center offers many tools to help you reach your leadership potential (http://leadandserve.tamu.edu).

  • Discover your Strengths through the StrengthsQuest™ assessment and workshops.
  • Establish your leadership vision through participation in the nationally-recognized LeaderShape Institute®.
  • Learn more about leadership through our Leadership Library and requested workshops.


Serving the community

Find opportunities to serve the local community through AggieServe at http://aggieserve.tamu.edu
summary: Whatever it is that you love, Student Activities is here to help you practice your passion through involvement in one of our 1000+ student organizations.
